# f5distributedcloud_origin_pool (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_origin_pool` data source retrieves information about an existing origin pool.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_origin_pool" "example" {
  name      = "my-origin-pool"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "origin_pool_port" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_origin_pool.example.port
}
```

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Copyright (c) Robin Mordasiewicz
# SPDX-License-Identifier: MPL-2.0

# Example: Look up an existing origin pool
data "f5distributedcloud_origin_pool" "existing" {
  name      = "backend-pool"
  namespace = "my-namespace"
}

output "origin_pool_port" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_origin_pool.existing.port
}

output "origin_pool_protocol" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_origin_pool.existing.endpoint_protocol
}

output "origin_pool_algorithm" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_origin_pool.existing.loadbalancer_algorithm
}

# Example: Use origin pool data in an HTTP load balancer
resource "f5distributedcloud_http_loadbalancer" "example" {
  name        = "example-lb"
  namespace   = data.f5distributedcloud_origin_pool.existing.namespace
  description = "Load balancer using existing pool"
  domains     = ["app.example.com"]
  http_port   = 80

  advertise_on_public = true

  default_pool {
    name      = data.f5distributedcloud_origin_pool.existing.name
    namespace = data.f5distributedcloud_origin_pool.existing.namespace
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the origin pool to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace containing the origin pool.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the origin pool.
- `endpoint_protocol` (String) Protocol to use for connecting to origin servers.
- `health_check_port` (Number) Port for health checks.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the origin pool.
- `loadbalancer_algorithm` (String) Load balancing algorithm used.
- `port` (Number) Port on which origin servers listen.
